<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2878</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Multimedia Projects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimedia-Projekte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projets de Multimédia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetos Dos Multimedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti Di Multimedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγράμματα πολυμέσων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyectos de las multimedias</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An article for educators which explains the rationale and the outcomes of using multu-media projects in the classroom based on the writer's experience in her own Matric and 10th grade English learing classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">multumedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">projects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rationale</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Artikel für Erzieher, der das Grundprinzip 
und die Resultate des Verwendens von von Multumedia Projekten im 
Klassenzimmer beschreibt, das auf der Erfahrung des Verfassers in 
ihrem eigenen Matric und des 10. Grades englischen learing 
Klassenzimmer basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un article pour des éducateurs qui explique le 
raisonnement et les résultats d'utiliser des projets de multu-medias 
dans la salle de classe basée sur l'expérience de l'auteur de sa 
propre salle de classe learing anglaise de la catégorie Matricielle 
et 10ème.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um artigo para educadores que explique o 
rationale e os resultados de usar projetos dos multu-media na sala de 
aula baseada na experiência do escritor em sua própria sala de aula 
learing inglesa de Matric e de 10o classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un articolo per gli educatori che spiega la 
spiegazione razionale ed i risultati di usando i progetti di 
multu-media nell'aula basata sull'esperienza del produttore di sua 
propria aula learing inglese grado del decimo e di Matric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άρθρο για τους εκπαιδευτικούς που εξηγεί τη 
λογική και τις εκβάσεις της χρησιμοποίησης των προγραμμάτων 
μuλτu-μέσων στην τάξη βασισμένη στην εμπειρία του συγγραφέα στη 
μήτρα και τη 10η αγγλική learing τάξη βαθμού της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un artículo para los educadores que explica el 
análisis razonado y los resultados de usar proyectos de los 
multu-media en la sala de clase basó en la experiencia del programa 
de escritura en su propia sala de clase learing inglesa de Matric y 
del 10mo grado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">multumedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundprinzip</string>
          </keyword>
